meta_description: Inspiring lifelong learning through the arts, including a collection of nearly 50,000 objects and dynamic programming for all ages.
hours_text:
## Museum Hours

Sunday: 10 am–5 pm  
Monday: Closed  
Tuesday: 10 am–5 pm  
Wednesday: 12–7 pm*  
Thursday: 10 am–5 pm  
Friday: 10 am–5 pm  
Saturday: 10 am–5 pm

[Reserve Your Tickets Today](https://my.noma.org/events/?k=all%20admission%20tickets)

## General Museum Admission Fees

| 

### Louisiana Residents

| 

### Out-of-State Visitors  
  
---|---|---  
Adults | $18 | $23  
Youth ages 19 and under | Free | Free  
Seniors ages 65 and up | $13 | $18  
Active military with ID | $13 | $18  
University Students with ID | $11 | $16  
  
Free admission for NOMA members to the museum and special exhibitions  
*Free general museum admission on Wednesdays for Louisiana residents courtesy of The Helis Foundation  
Free general museum admission for youth ages 13–19, courtesy of The Helis Foundation****

[More Free and Discounted Admission Programs](https://noma.org/visit/visitor-information/free-and-discounted-admission/)

* * *

## Sydney and Walda Besthoff Sculpture Garden Admission and Hours

Free and open to the public seven days a week. Donations are appreciated.

Summer Hours (April–September): 10 am–6 pm  
Winter Hours (October–March): 10 am–5 pm

* * *

## Holiday Hours

The museum and the Besthoff Sculpture Garden are **open 10 am–3 pm** on the following holidays:

  * Easter
  * Memorial Day
  * Independence Day
  * Christmas Eve
  * New Year’s Eve

The Besthoff Sculpture Garden ONLY is open from **10 am–3 pm** on the following holidays:

  * Labor Day
